attributes.action: All Politicians must sign a waiver to take minimum wage for the rest of their lives.
attributes.additional_details:
All Politicians must sign a waiver to take minimum wage for the rest of their lives.
This must be written into a new UK constitution that; No member of any UK political party can ever receive wages higher than the national UK Minimum income. Furthermore they are to never receive any additional income or receive payouts from any other sources internally or externally from the government.  For the rest of their lives. Failure to do this or any proof of additional funds being received will be taken as a criminal action.
